data.sunServiceSchema:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>

<ServicesConfiguration><Service name="SocialFacebookNode" version="1.0"><Schema i18nFileName="org/forgerock/openam/auth/nodes/SocialFacebookNode"  i18nKey="nodeDescription"  resourceName="SocialFacebookNode"  revisionNumber="1"  serviceHierarchy="/DSAMEConfig/SocialFacebookNode" ><Organization><SubSchema i18nKey="nodeDescription"  inheritance="multiple"  name="instance"  resourceName="USE-PARENT"  validate="yes" ><AttributeSchema i18nKey="authenticationIdKey"  name="authenticationIdKey"  order="900"  resourceName="authenticationIdKey"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>id</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="cfgAccountMapperConfiguration"  name="cfgAccountMapperConfiguration"  order="1400"  resourceName="cfgAccountMapperConfiguration"  syntax="string"  type="list"  uitype="maplist"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>[id]=iplanet-am-user-alias-list</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="saveUserAttributesToSession"  name="saveUserAttributesToSession"  order="1600"  resourceName="saveUserAttributesToSession"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>true</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="cfgMixUpMitigation"  name="cfgMixUpMitigation"  order="1700"  resourceName="cfgMixUpMitigation"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>false</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="authorizeEndpoint"  name="authorizeEndpoint"  order="300"  resourceName="authorizeEndpoint"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0 URLValidator1" ><DefaultValues><Value>https://www.facebook.com/dialog/oauth</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="tokenEndpoint"  name="tokenEndpoint"  order="400"  resourceName="tokenEndpoint"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0 URLValidator1" ><DefaultValues><Value>https://graph.facebook.com/v2.12/oauth/access_token</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="scopeString"  name="scopeString"  order="600"  resourceName="scopeString"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>public_profile,email</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="userInfoEndpoint"  name="userInfoEndpoint"  order="500"  resourceName="userInfoEndpoint"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0 URLValidator1" ><DefaultValues><Value>https://graph.facebook.com/v2.6/me?fields=name%2Cemail%2Cfirst_name%2Clast_name</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="cfgAccountProviderClass"  name="cfgAccountProviderClass"  order="1100"  resourceName="cfgAccountProviderClass"  syntax="string"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping.DefaultAccountProvider</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="cfgAccountMapperClass"  name="cfgAccountMapperClass"  order="1200"  resourceName="cfgAccountMapperClass"  syntax="string"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping.JsonAttributeMapper|*|facebook-</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="cfgAttributeMappingClasses"  name="cfgAttributeMappingClasses"  order="1300"  resourceName="cfgAttributeMappingClasses"  syntax="string"  type="list"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>org.forgerock.openam.authentication.modules.common.mapping.JsonAttributeMapper|iplanet-am-user-alias-list|facebook-</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="cfgAttributeMappingConfiguration"  name="cfgAttributeMappingConfiguration"  order="1500"  resourceName="cfgAttributeMappingConfiguration"  syntax="string"  type="list"  uitype="maplist"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ><DefaultValues><Value>[first_name]=givenName</Value><Value>[email]=mail</Value><Value>[name]=cn</Value><Value>[last_name]=sn</Value><Value>[id]=iplanet-am-user-alias-list</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="issuer"  name="issuer"  order="1800"  resourceName="issuer"  syntax="string"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value></Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="provider"  name="provider"  order="800"  resourceName="provider"  syntax="string"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>facebook</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="redirectURI"  name="redirectURI"  order="700"  resourceName="redirectURI"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0 URLValidator1" ><DefaultValues><Value>http://openam:80/am</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="clientId"  name="clientId"  order="100"  resourceName="clientId"  syntax="string"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="basicAuth"  name="basicAuth"  order="1000"  resourceName="basicAuth"  syntax="boolean"  type="single" ><DefaultValues><Value>true</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema i18nKey="clientSecret"  name="clientSecret"  order="200"  resourceName="clientSecret"  syntax="password"  type="single"  validator="RequiredValueValidator0" ></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="RequiredValueValidator0"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>com.sun.identity.sm.RequiredValueValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema><AttributeSchema name="URLValidator1"  syntax="string"  type="validator" ><DefaultValues><Value>org.forgerock.openam.sm.validation.URLValidator</Value></DefaultValues></AttributeSchema></SubSchema></Organization></Schema></Service></ServicesConfiguration>
